subject: Sports Injuries
Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: North Carolina point guard Kendall Marshall had surgery on his broken right wrist Monday, but it was unclear if he will return for the Tar Heels’ N.C.A.A. regional games in St. Louis, his father said.
snippet: North Carolina point guard Kendall Marshall had surgery on his broken right wrist Monday, but it was unclear if he will return for the Tar Heels’ N.C.A.A. regional games in St. Louis, his father said.
